Activity: Arrive at the office and check emails.
Finalize the agenda for the stakeholder meeting regarding the project communication materials.

Attend the stakeholder meeting with @clinlead-1, @pchmp-1, @rn-1, @rn-2, @rn-3, @his-1, @his-2, @mrs-1, @mrs-2. Discuss the project overview and FAQs, gather feedback, and identify any missing information or concerns.
Compile notes from the stakeholder meeting, noting key feedback points and action items. Prioritize revisions to the project overview and FAQs based on stakeholder input.
Revise the project overview document based on feedback from the stakeholder meeting. Incorporate suggestions for improving clarity, addressing concerns, and adding missing information.
Revise the FAQs based on feedback from the stakeholder meeting. Add new questions and answers as needed. Ensure consistency with the revised project overview document.
Send an updated version of the project overview and FAQs to @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 for final review and approval. Topic: Updated Project Communication Materials for Review.
Begin developing a communication plan outlining target audiences, key messages, communication channels, and timelines for disseminating information about the project.
End of day. Leave the office.
